product.name: Nova Elite Wireless Earbuds
product.description: Premium true wireless earbuds with adaptive active noise cancellation and spatial audio. Crafted for discerning listeners who demand studio-quality sound in a compact form factor. Features our proprietary HiFi driver technology.
benefits: Immersive 3D soundstage for music and movies
Block out distractions for deep work

store_brand.brand_voice: Premium, tech-forward, minimalist. We create audio experiences for discerning listeners who appreciate precision engineering and understated sophistication.
store_brand.visual_style: Dark backgrounds with subtle gradients. Product-centric imagery with dramatic lighting. Clean typography, minimal clutter. Metallic accents on deep blacks.

channel.audience_context: Tech-savvy professionals and audiophiles aged 25-45. High disposable income, value premium quality over price. Interested in high-fidelity audio, productivity tools, and minimalist design.

store_context.customer_summary: Audiophiles and professionals seeking premium audio equipment. Customers research extensively and value quality, durability, and sound performance over price.
